author: milinda
msg: ramapart_issued.c and rampart_issued_token.c added to linux build and fix some typos.

author: jeremias
msg: Recognize the newly used EN_AUTO constant for break values. Other LMs generate a -1 value for this case.

author: supun
msg: This patch includes changes to the
1. rampart_config_t for setting a callback function for acquiring an issued token
2. Added two files rampart_issued.c and rampart_issued_token.c to handle the issued tokens
3. Added a scenario20 for demonstrating the issued token aquisition.
4. A bug fix in the rampart_context_get_supporting_token function.
5. Changes to the windows build system for buidlign the saml_sts service and issued_token client.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-177: Simplify job: no active and finished flags needed, job is removed after processing from the repository.
Handle case where a job is sent directly.
